resources.string: Please select an application running mode. First one must be "Model creation".
Please enable usage accessibility setting to let this application collect your behavioral data and identify you.
The application is still collecting data to generate your behavioral profile and learn from it to identify you. Collected data is displayed below.
The application is continuously collecting your behavior to verify you against your already trained profile. Collected data is displayed below.

The application is collecting your behaviour to verify it against your already trained profile. If your score is >85, then this instance is added to your profile to raise its trust. Collected data is displayed below.

Current collected parameters (last 1m):

 - Brightness:
 - Light:
 - Memory usage:
 - Network stats:
 - Bluetooth stats:
 - Locked time:
 - Locks:
 - First App:
 - Last App:
 - Number of apps:
 - Most used last day:
Your model is not sufficiently trained. Please train it for approximately 1 day and try again. The application needs more data to train your model.
